H0.text: Covalent is the force of attraction that holds together two atoms that share a pair of valence electrons.

H1.text: Polar is the bond that is the force of attraction that holds together two atoms that share a pair of valence electrons.

H2.text: Hydrogen is the force of attraction that holds together two atoms that share a pair of valence electrons.

H3.text: Metallic is the bond that holds together two atoms that share a pair of valence electrons.

A4.text: A covalent bond is a chemical bond that involves the sharing of electrons to form electron pairs between atoms.
